# SLAY Visualization Data Log
# Generated: 2026-01-28T06:17:48.394690
#============================================================

## ANALYSIS CONTEXT

### Goal
Show attention weight as a function of angle in a clear 2D polar format.

### What to Look For
1) How quickly attention drops off with angular distance. 2) Compare the 'sharpness' of each kernel's attention profile. 3) Verify SLAY approximates spherical YAT profile closely.

### Expected Conclusion
Spherical YAT produces sharper, more localized attention than softmax. SLAY closely matches the spherical YAT profile, validating the approximation.

#------------------------------------------------------------

## Description
2D polar projection of attention weights

# Value: 100
